I feel very sae there are officers eerywhere on campus to the time yu go to bed to the time you wake up there always on campus
sigmas,deltas,omega,kappas alpha, aka's,sigma ladies
Losts of club to many to name
Fayetteville state is an open enviroment , everyone is accepted !

PEP-Rallies are a must attend situation , its a very fun enviroment and Homecoming is allways a fun ocaision were we always bring in new or upcoming artist to perform and students may get the chance to rub elbows with a celeb.
Our Bookstore offers alot of sales and goes down on prices every now and then making things cheaper for students
We have a gameroom located downstairs of our student center that offers a varied amount of options
There is a excellent staff in the dinning hall , they are very welcoming , and the food is also good .

Dorm life can be either , bad or good depending on how you comunicate , If you allow situations to occur then they will continue but if you talk to those around you about there behavior, there should be no problems with dorm living
Our Academic struture is pretty strongm, but its up to you to keep your own grades together.
Have all of your finacail aid on file !!!

A very diverse University, with different people from different walks of life. There is alot to offer from this campus , with majors and etc. The liabary is a great place to find books that you need for your education , being one of the liabarys that ships out books to other schools such as Methodist University Here In Fayetteville NC.

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I am learning a lot here at FSU. There are many great opportunities and the teachers care. There are many different programs in which I participate in that allows me get extra help that I need in my classes. my favorite one is the writing center. The writing center allows students to have a tutor critique their writing assignment and get better grades in their classes.
